title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, Appendices, app 75-B
content:

State Regulations
§ 75-B.1 - Introduction
§ 75-B.2 - Activated carbon treatment systems
INDIVIDUAL WATER SUPPLIES - TREATMENT SYSTEMS
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, Appendices, app
75-B
Appendix ( §§
75-B.1-75-B.2) filed: Feb. 20, 1990 eff. Dec. 1, 1990; March 6, 1990 eff. Dec. 1, 1990. Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §201(1)(1)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
